item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Congress Tavern located downtown on Orange St. between Waybosset & Pine Streets.

It has a nice down-to-earth, yet somewhat sophisticated atmosphere in an upscale pub setting, well-stocked bar and good food! Not too big, and not too small, it's a great one to know about!

Also, it happens that THIS Monday is also the last in the four debates, watch Obama and Romney face off, and where better than the Congress!!!!

AND on an MNM!!! Wow!

Presidential Debate #4

Topic: Foreign policy
Air Time: 9:00-10:30 p.m. Eastern Time
Location: Lynn University in Boca Raton, Florida (Tickets)
Sponsor: Commission on Presidential Debates
Participants: President Barack Obama and Mitt Romney
Moderator: Bob Schieffer (Host of Face the Nation on CBS)

The format for the debate will be identical to the first presidential debate and will focus on foreign policy.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a pink and brown scarf (the same as the one in my profile picture), but we're hard to miss!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Congress Tavern plus the last Presidential Debate!!!
